description: Hachisuka is the leader of the Hishimanji Guren Gang. The Hishimanji gang appears a group of gangsters who spread rumors about Megumi Takani being a "quack-doctor" and rely on Raiko, a fake shaman, to "cure" people with his "holy water" and live off the profits. Eventually, Megumi and the others catch on and defeat the gang, in the process make Raiko admit the truth.
name: Hachisuka
